ipecnews.news: Due to elections in Ghaziabad, college will remain closed on 11th April 2019
Team Reverence is organizing a Health Camp for underprivileged section, on 12th April 2019, 2 p.m. onwards in front of Central Library IPEC
Even Sem Theory Exam 2018-19 centre for IPEC students will be JSS Academy Of Technical Education.
Schedule For PUT Exams for Even Sem is between 25th April to 2nd May
Last date for filling up the Even Sem Exam form is 20th April 2019. After which fine will be charged by university.
NEURANG - 2019 organize by EDC has been postpone due to preponement of End Semester Exams
ECE Department is organizing a Project Exhibition for final year projects on 22nd April 2019
IPEC is organizing 3rd International Conference on Advances In Computing And Data Sciences on April 12-13, 2019
